title: Dowlatabad, Dargaz
text: Dowlatabad (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Dowlatābād) is a village in <a href="Zangelanlu%20Rural%20District">Zangelanlu Rural District</a>, <a href="Lotfabad%20District">Lotfabad District</a>, <a href="Dargaz%20County">Dargaz County</a>, <a href="Razavi%20Khorasan%20Province">Razavi Khorasan Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 437, in 102 families.
